name: Learn English Listening
description: Learn English by Listening Learn English with more than 1000 AudioBooks Get complete lesson audiobooks library access  from beginner to advanced. Master English 100% with lesson notes, English translations, quizzes, and vocabulary & phrase. In this app you can :  - English listening with full text and audio. - English listening with daily conversations. Translated to any languages. - Record your voice and listen to your pronunciation. - Download each conversation with pdf file . - 150 classic audiobooks to listening and reading. - 1500 English conversations with audio. - More than 1000 audiobooks. You can search the book you like. - English listening test. - Learn English with grammar and test.
